data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Uthai Thani, Thailand to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Uthai Thani, Thailand

data.prayer: Father, help the 2,466 believers in Uthai Thani to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.section_summary: On average, 47 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Uthai Thani, Thailand.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Uthai Thani, Thailand to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Uthai Thani.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Ugong people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Spirit, defend the church in the state of Uthai Thani against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Uthai Thani who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Uthai Thani, Thailand. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

location.name: Uthai Thani
location.cities_list: Uthai Thani, Thap Than, Lan Sak, Huai Khot, Sawang Arom
